context.user_input: Hello GAIA. Would you please use your primitive functions to read the dev_matrix task list, then determine if any functions are showing incomplete but should be marked complete.
context.gaia_response:
Based on the conversation, it seems you are looking to refine GAIA-Dev. Here is the plan to mark tasks as complete:

1. Mark the following tasks as complete:
   - ai.execute('ai.helper.read("knowledge/system_reference/dev_matrix.json")')
   - ai.execute('ai.helper.sketch("Refinement Plan", "1. Read task list. 2. Mark incomplete tasks as complete. 3. Update dev_matrix.json. 4. Confirm updates."')
   - ai.execute('ai.helper.update_dev_matrix_status("Refinement Plan", "Completed")')

Please confirm if these tasks should be marked as complete.
